title: When Panning on a scene with video camera, playback hesitates every 5 or so seconds
content:
Hi.  I recently purchased a new google pixel 3.  I do so on its reputation for the camera (still and video).  I plan to use it a lot for hiking pictures and videos, especially from viewpoints on the trail.  When testing the still/video camera on a recent hike, I noticed that when I used the video camera and panned slowly from a viewpoint on the trail, the playback occasionally "jerks" or hesitates.  It does it every 5-10 seconds.
Settings for video:
  Back Camera video resolution: HD 1080p
  Front camera video resolution: HD 1080p
  Video stabilization: On
Need someone from Google to respond as this issue is a very important problem for me (based on why I bought the camera).
Android version: 9
Security patch level: March 5, 2019

Much thanks for any help.

Ken
